Constructor & Destructor Documentation

◆ BallBounce()

vision_filter::BallBounce::BallBounce ( )
delete

These functions are wrapped into a class instead of a namespace so that the config system can be used. It requires a class with the REGISTER_CONFIGUABLE define. Additionally, this allows for the extra helper functions to be hidden.

Calculates whether the given kalman ball will bounce against another robot and the resulting velocity vector

Parameters
ballKalman ball we are trying to test
yellow_robotsBest estimation of the yellow robots states
blue_robotsBest estimation of the yellow robots states
out_new_velOutput of the resulting velocity vector after bounce
Returns
Whether the ball bounces or not
